name: Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Spent a few days at this hotel in a two bedroom suite, very large suite with fantastic view of the river, very good value , excellent food, allthough surrounded by the city the pool area is amazingly quiet
reviews.title: great hotel great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: with the only noise comming from river traffic. a great escape from the hetic city.
reviews.title: not what I thought as a no1 hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well some sort of mixed feelings come to me when I think about the Chatrium hotel and Bangkok. Not as if the hotel was bad or good, but the experience was not the memorable kind that I expected as a no1 rated hotel on the tripadvisor website.
reviews.title: The best deal by the Chao Praya River

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Most of all the downside part of the stay was certainly the location. Although the shuttle boat was at service every 15 minutes and it took you straight to the skytrain station, it was not that convenient as it should be. Still the surroundings of the hotel was not a place to stroll down in the afternoon. The overall experience in bangkok on the first day was not very welcoming, due to the scandals that pop into you with a friendly smile on their face and the tuk tuks that charge more than a taxi and even say they dont know where your hotel is after sitting and giving a ride and then leaving you in the middle of nowhere in the rain......Maybe the first impressions are the most memorable. And another thing to note is the pool that was not warm so could not have a swim to relax.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But the rooms were good, not very Thai style decoration seen, and only the essentials are used in the interior design of all the hotel. It seems that less is more was the decorators motto! Breakfast was not a big feast but certainly everything was in the best quality, also the top to floor windows in the breakfast area were a great start in the morning. The staff were very friendly and helpful but do not expect them all to understand and speak English! After all the experience was not bad but having stayed in many 5* hotels and resorts, certainly will never again pay a 5* price to a 4* hotel, even if the paying is for a great view to the river. The upgrade was worth it, having great views but still the overall experience is a 4* one....
reviews.title: good place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: i had stay there for 2 days and it was very nice views ( Grand Suit Riverside view / Packet Getaway B ) Hotel room very nice comfortable and staff are friendly helpful / fair price.. Also near 7/11 just Fist tower Chatrium Condo.. There have 3 type of Chatrium.. 1 is Chatrium Condo 2. Chatrium Resident and 3. Chatrium Suit ( near riveside View ) Have service both from Hotel to the Peir Sapantaksin BTS
reviews.title: Very Beautiful place/romantic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I fled to the Chatruim Suites after my other hotel in Bangkok had a rat issue. The Chatrium Suites was a beautiful breeze of fresh air. It was perfect. The hotel is absolutely stunning. The lobby alone is gorgeous. The staff Is very friendly and helpful. They speak English which was also very helpful. Our room was beautiful. And the view of the city took my breath way. We stayed on the 30th floor in the 1 bedroom suite. The room was spotless. It had a huge kitchen and living room and separate bedroom. The bathroom was very large and had a separate tub. The hotel was so comforting to come back to after a day in Bangkok. The restaurant was wonderful, especially the view and live music every night. It was a great way to end the day. There is a Starbucks also right next door which was very convenient. Overall, I had an amazing experience at the hotel and cannot wait to return.
reviews.title: A Beautiful Hotel, I can't wait to return.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is really lovely and good value for money when you consider other hotels of the same class. It's by the river and has a free boat shuttle service from its own private pier to the main public pier where you can catch the sky train or another boat to get further along the river. They have a great breakfast selection and you have the option of sitting outside by the river to enjoy this. The rooms are lovely and spacious (we had a grand suite) as well as clean and comfortable. The facilities are good - gym, large pool, restaurants. If you do stay here and miss breakfast one day you should check out the dim sum buffet at the restaurant on floor 36 for 700BHT per person - a bit expensive but worth it for the food and luxury with view.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel but don't trust the concierge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The only thing we weren't happy with was the concierge service... We wanted to go to the Ancient City and we asked what the best way to go would be. He immediately said taxi and called to find out how much it would be and quoted us 1500TBH each way. We asked if there were any alternative ways to get there and he said no. We then did some research online and found that you could get 2 buses totaling 26BHT which would take you right outside the entrance or you could take the sky train 40TBH to On Nut and then a taxi for 180TBH... both much cheaper and better options.
reviews.title: Overall nice hotel and value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While in Bangkok please beware of tuk tuk drivers quoting you very low prices and asking if they can take you to just one stop on the way... they get fuel vouchers from the companies you stop at and not only does this waste LOADS of time in bangkok traffic but they are likely to ask you for just one more stop after the first "one stop" and so on - don't get sucked in!
reviews.title: We loved it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not the plushest hotel in Bangkok (and already looking a bit tatty in places, even though it is only a few years old), but great value for money with good river lcoation.
reviews.title: great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Late night arrival slick and helpful (S class merc transfer good value through hotel) - ate dinner in retuarant on terrace at 0045 but before it shut at 0100
reviews.title: Excellent location wonderful stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As busy with chinese new year we were upgraded to 1 bed suite - nice modern touches (shower with view). Sizeable balcony area.
reviews.title: acceptable given its reasonable price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: Very helpful conceiege - and good cakes and coffees in lounge during day.
reviews.title: Not As Great As I Thought ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Lots of ourdoor dinning seating - less pool loungers and shade (so get there early).
reviews.title: Outstanding!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: The 2 bedroom suite facing the river view was good, clean, quiet with all the amenities usually provided for in a good hotel. We were particularly impressed with the service at the restaurants, especially so by Bobby at the River Barge outlet. He was so cheerful and smiley and gave superb service.
reviews.title: Great location, nice suite and great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only down side is that we had to pay for the internet. Other than that, everything else was great.
reviews.title: Perfect end to our 10 week holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The ferry shuttle service to the BTS station was excellent. It was really convenient to get around quickly and comfortably, without all the hassle of getting caught in traffic jams.
reviews.title: great time at chatrium hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel airport transfers was also very convenient for us, although it was a bit pricey. If we had got a taxi at the airport, we would probably have a hard time explaining where the hotel is located.
reviews.title: Outstanding hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011
reviews.text: So, overall we had a very relaxing and pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Amazing

description: Located on the banks of the majestic Chao Phraya River with the cultural and historical hub of Bangkok at its doorsteps, the 5-star Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok offers a premium choice in Bangkok accommodation by blending spacious yet luxurious contemporary rooms and suites with warm and friendly Thai hospitality.Winner of Trip Advisors 2012 Travelers' Choice Award for Best Hotel Bangkok, amongst all Bangkok Hotels, Thailand, our very large rooms and suites, all with large balconies and stunning views, combined with friendly and attentive service are just some of the simply remarkable features we offer as a 5-Star Hotel Bangkok.Whether for business, leisure, meetings or just simply pleasure, our ability to tailor our products and services to your needs will certainly create a remarkable experience within the most remarkable Hotel in Bangkok."Your River Hotel Bangkok awaits"
